name: Demon Turf: Trials
description:
Demon Turf Trials?! That's right! A free version of the 3D Platformer with attitude that comes with a comprehensive demo and unique challenge levels that unlock every week! Compete in the leaderboards to become #1. Why? For the thrill!



  • A demo that introduces you to the story and includes the tutorial, the hub with some side-quests and two levels from the first turf. Woah!
  • A new carefully crafted, unique and challenging trial that unlocks every week and comes with leaderboards! Can you become #1?
  • A playground where you can experiment with the game's in-depth moveset!
  • A unique aesthetic combining the expressiveness of 2D illustrations with the depth and sense of exploration 3D environments can offer!
  • Pull off some clever platforming combinations or get physical with a special physics-driven combat system that ramps up the chaos and fun. Push, pull and spin your enemies out of your way.
  • Special turf abilities granting you additional abilities to become the ultimate speedrunner!
  • Settings! Yeah, we got those. Exciting right? But they're pretty comprehensive lemme tell ya!


HISTORY

From the makers of Slime-san comes their newest creation! The team used everything they learned from their 2D platformer to elevate this 3D platformer to the next level!
